title: Grant Mudford. Max Pam
creator_credit: Roger Young, Jeff Atkinson, Kevin Ballantine, Brian Beaton and Izon Productions
brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Visual instincts : Australian contemporary photographers”.
Two thirty minute programs: 1. “Grant Mudford” Born in Australia in 1944, photographer, Grant Mudford, now lives and works in California. He prefers anonymous architectural subject matter photographed in a manner that transforms it. 2. “Max Pam” Born in Melbourne, Max Pam left at age 19 for Katmandu. He returned to Australia in 1984 having established an international reputation as a photographer of Asia. Photography, for Pam, has the capacity to capture certain moments which elude the writer, the filmmaker or the painter.
